blog.title: Jonsa101
blog.description: #Jonsa and #Sharpwin Meta Writer. Pop Culture Obsessed. Lover of Street Style.

summary: This notion that it’s absolutely ridiculous to not believe in Jon and Dany’s romance based on the show is ridiculous! You know...
body:
This notion that it’s absolutely ridiculous to not believe in Jon and Dany’s romance based on the show is ridiculous! You know why a big portion of this fandom doesn’t believe in Jonerys?! It’s because it was a really awfully done shitty romance and that’s from someone who was genuinely rooting for them as a casual viewer in season 7! That’s the truth of the matter! Not to mention that personality wise they’re completely different and live by different morals, but that’s beside the point. I definitely believe more people would be more inclined to jump on the Jonerys ship if the romance was well done and believable but it’s not. At best, season 7 gave us a girl who seemed really interested in a guy but he wasn’t that into her and for some reason he ended up sleeping with her. I’m not going to pretend that some deep, profound, romance occurred when the show clearly showed me otherwise. I’m not going to pretend like a couple is a great pair when in reality they have nothing in common and are actually foils and I’m definitely not going to pretend like there is some earth shattering chemistry between two characters when in actuality it was lackluster and almost nonexistent!

From the very beginning, Jon and Dany’s “love story” seemed off and I’m not one to try and force a relationship when narratively wise it doesn’t seem like it’s meant to be.

Fucking brilliant this. 
Also..I realized something. With what Cersei said.. "Half the Targaryens went mad, didn't they?...
body:
Fucking brilliant this.

Also..I realized something. With what Cersei said.. “Half the Targaryens went mad, didn’t they? Everytime a Targaryen is born, the Gods flip a coin.”

Well.

Rhaegar-Viserys

Daenerys-Jon

Everytime a Targaryen is born,the Gods flip a coin.

Everytime a Targaryen is born, the Gods flip a coin.

Everytime a Targaryen is born, the Gods flip a coin.

😏

summary: Words with Cedar spurious: adj. 1) false, fake, not authentic From the Latin...
caption:
Words with Cedar

spurious: adj. 1) false, fake, not authentic

From the Latin spurius, denoting illegitimate birth.


Below: the ancestrally spurious Jon Snow spurred his horse on through the torrent of wind and snow.

title: THE REUNION 2.0
body:
Sweet @otp-chemistry asked my opinion on the HBO promo so, here we go.

Let me first say that Sansa opening her arms to welcome Jon really gets to me and if you add that she’s probably smiling (we can see her tense cheek) we have a confirmation that she still trusts him and probably knows what’s happening. Anyway, I’m not sure this will be the final cut, not only because very often for advertising it’s used a different one, but it also appears that there are some missing beats between the first and the second part. Maybe we will be able to see Jon’s face? Maybe they’ll both have their eyes closed for a moment? I hope so, and since there are new people to be introduced… I believe this time we will see them pull away (I like the idea that Sansa will be the first to do it because Jon does not want to).

About the hug:

they are really pressed against each other! I wonder if this is a one arm hug, because if it’s not, the only place where Jon can put his right arm (look at the last frame before the close up on Sansa) would be under her cloak. Also, I saw many gifs that hypothesize some whispered words, but if you notice how Jon’s ear is close to Sansa’s, that’s definitely too forward for his lips to “rest” on her ear. Of course these details don’t necessarily mean something, it could simply be the director’s choice for a better effect (and it’s not that easy to shoot the embrace without framing the height difference). At first then I got the impression that there was a zoom in on them but the background remains almost the same, which means that Jon is holding Sansa very tight, cradling her to himself like, “Come here, I’m never letting you go again”… One last thing: is that Brienne’s giant shoulder beside Sansa’s head? Because if she is already there, maybe she might have carried a message with her…

As for the initial part, again the background tells us something: 

probably Jon’s just arrived because behind him we can see the ramparts to the left of Winterfell’s entrance and so probably Sansa was already waiting, as also confirmed by her position (she has behind her the ramparts in front of the entrance). 

It makes sense because they’re in daylight so someone must have warned them of the party coming.

I’d like to think that maybe Jon will arrive a little before the others just to have time to properly reunite with his family but if you look to his left there is a wagon with a soldier on it that’s difficult was already there because it’s near the entrance, which is usually free from obstacles. So I think they will arrive all together, and since D&D love their parallels, maybe we’ll have a welcome like this

And to mark a difference, maybe not everyone will be present this time: Bran for exemple is a bit tactless these days (I wouldn’t be surprised if the first thing out of his mouth were “Hello Aegon”) so maybe their first meeting will be in private and he will go straight sucker punching him with the TRUTH. And as much as I’d love to see Arya running towards Jon I don’t think her new NO ONE self makes it probable, at least not in front of everyone. So I really think this will be the first hug and since it seems he kind of starts walking, with just a hint of a twirl, Sansa already quite close, I have a wishful thought: Ghost has moved from her to meet and greet Jon (and the more money we know that D&D have asked HBO to spend on more CGI would be very well spent)… But, much more simply, probably Jon has just dismounted off his horse!

To conclude, the funny part: I really can’t find the words to describe Jon aiming straight to Sansa’s lips only to change direction at the last moment preferring the safest neck… I choose not to comment!

That’s it everyone!

Thanks for listening.

blog.name: reddragon1995
blog.title: Jonerys Snowstorm Of House Stargaryen
blog.description: HE LOVED HER AND SHE LOVED HIM

body:
The Pointy End

Game of Thrones S1E8 rewatch:

  • I love Varys’ hoodie/track suit thing he has going on when he’s sneaking around in the dungeon, and he’s right, Ned is a moron.
  • Jon, Jon, Jon. You’ll get Ser Alliser one day. I understand that Ser Alliser was a Targ loyalist who was sent to the wall rather than executed. This hasn’t been mentioned in the show that I recall, but if anyone…ANYONE…thought to tell Jon the truth, maybe he could have avoided some trouble from that asshole?
  • Dany is getting BOSSY and I love it. She’s 5’2” and a teenager, and she’s not here for these Dothraki and their toxic masculinity. I’m also proud of the way she has “tamed” Drogo. What a big squishy he has become.
  • Angry Jason Momoa is the hottest Jason Momoa.
  • There needed to be more Greatjon Umber because he’s almost as entertaining as Bronn.
  • And Bronn. I’ve decided Bronn is the Han Solo of Westeros.
  • Robb Stark is a snack
  • I think on critique of season 7 is that it focuses more on The White Walkers that the political intrigue. umm….the White Walkers have always been the endgame. “The cold winds are rising.” - Osha “When they wake up….I hope the wall is high enough.” -Sam
  • Also, there are books about them in Maester Aemon’s library. Put a pin in that?
  • Jon vs. the wight. Jon Snow, you so brave!

blog.name: hypomone535
blog.title: Dream of Ice and Fire
blog.description:
I am a Stark of Winterfell

I am a writer of Jonsa

tags: someone help me with tumblr links
body:
Not Like the Songs - Chapter 10

Like a cold wind on her bare skin, Sansa was defenseless against the memory of that question.

“What do you want that you do not have?”

When he had ridden back into Winterfell’s gates, a black tower against the blanket of white destruction, how eagerly she had opened her arms.

“I’ve tried to be smart Sansa.” He had whispered into the crook of her neck.

“Have you?” had been her muffled reply. The joy of his homecoming tainted as her eyes had risen from behind his shoulder, and fell into the face of the Dragon Queen.

Strong emotion stirred in her belly as she thought about this man and his gentle eyes. She had practiced wearing a mask for so many years, untouched by the changes around her, and he had seen her anyway. The rhythm of their life was so sweet. The eager dynamic between her and Jon had been building slowly, reconstructing her heart and renaming her soul.

Her stomach swooped as the weight of the realization fell, heady and terrifying. She had married him out of duty, but here she sat, miles away from a home she’d vowed never to leave again. For him.

Looking back up at Gilly, Sansa remained silent. Knowing any more words she could offer would be utterly useless.

Read the whole story on AO3

http://bit.ly/2MXfxlv

summary: The fact that the GOT fandom has becoming a version of the shipping war in Smallville doesn’t please me one bit.  But the...
body:
The fact that the GOT fandom has becoming a version of the shipping war in Smallville doesn’t please me one bit. 

But the similarities between the theory that is political!Jon and the “Lois Lane will die, Chloe Sullivan will take her name, her job and her soulmate Superman and become the real Lois Lane” theory are too much for me.

If there are SV fans who’re watching the political Jon theory evolve and remembers “Chloe is the real Lois. She sat in front of a name plate that said Lois Lane! Let’s ignore and demonize the actual Lois Lane” theories, hit me up.

I can’t get over the toxicity of these fandoms that support such toxic theories for the sake of propelling their preferred ship and their preferred female character. I mean, things worked out for Lois Lane, Clark Kent, and the ship. But I’m not happy about seeing a version of that grossness again.

What is similar in these instances?

summary: “Joffrey never let anyone question his authority.”- Sansa to Jon.  Guess who will not let anyone question her “I was born to...
body:
“Joffrey never let anyone question his authority.”- Sansa to Jon.

Guess who will not let anyone question her “I was born to rule the seven kingdoms” or they burn?

Sansa is going to have some fun.

blog.title: liam cunningham is still a jonsa
blog.description: elizabeth. Sophie Turner thinks I'm amazing

summary:
Do y'all like good fic? Have you ever had an AMAZING idea for a fic but lacked the talent to write it out? 
WELL THEN GOOD NEWS...
body:
Do y'all like good fic? Have you ever had an AMAZING idea for a fic but lacked the talent to write it out?


WELL THEN GOOD NEWS FOR YOU


@captainbee89 (author of such iconic fics as I won’t let you be denied, a-z kink list, undeclosed desires, and not my sister among others) is auctioning off her 200th fic!!!!!


So start putting in your bids now because you know you want her to write that filthy smutty au you’ve had in the back of your head-or turn your favorite romcom into jonsa goodness, or really whatever she writes it all and it’s all amazing!!!

summary: Seeing Stark and Targaryen sigils combined on merchandise validates my 2011 self.
